channel.title: Bowling for Columbine
channel.description:
It is a documentary Directed by Michael Moore.
It is a review of the Columbine Shooting and gun violence in the United States compared to other countries.
I highly recommend that everyone watches it, not only is it educational, but it shows you that when you say something like "Bitch, epic fail I'm gonna go in your school and kill all your classmates.", you can horrify some people. It was a very sad and dramatic video and I almost was pretty disturbed and sad during some parts.
Anyway, that is a movie that I believe has a good influence on people who watch it.
I hope someone watches it...

item.title: Bowling for Columbine
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

I’ve seen this, I still remember, in Utah, you got a free gun when you opened a bank account at this bank, and the guy said “Don’t you think it’s kinda dangerous handing out guns in a bank!?”. I still lol about that.

Read full topic

I highly recommend that everyone watches it, not only is it educational, but it shows you that when you say something like “Bitch, epic fail I’m gonna go in your school and kill all your classmates.”, you can horrify some people.
